original_title: Substitute Flesh Urinal. Never Ending Ejaculation. My Life For Ten Days Locked Away With Immoral Wicked Old Guy. Karen Kaede
overview: To save her beloved younger brother. Karen agrees to stay in the house of a Yakuza guy for 10 days and serve him.  She was blown away by his endless stamina, but eventually, there’s a happy ending. So there’s that.
title: Substitute Flesh Urinal. Never Ending Ejaculation. My Life For Ten Days Locked Away With Immoral Wicked Old Guy. Karen Kaede
